update t_rectification_tbl
check_id = #{checkId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item1 = #{item1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item2 = #{item2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_rectification_tbl set check_id = #{checkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item1 = #{item1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item2 = #{item2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item3 = #{item3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, plan_time = #{planTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select T1.id, T3.name companyName, T2.flag, T1.check_id checkId, T2.title, T2.depart, T2.type, T2.industry_type industryType, T2.real_time realTime, T2.cheker, T2.dapart_contact dapartContact, T2.check_company checkCompany, (select count(0) from t_check_item_tbl where check_id = T1.check_id and status > 1) a, (select count(0) from t_check_item_tbl where check_id = T1.check_id and status = 3) b, (select count(0) from t_recheck_tbl where check_id = T1.check_id) c from t_rectification_tbl T1 left join t_check_tbl T2 on T1.check_id = T2.id left join company_view T3 on T2.user_id = T3.user_id
T1.del = 0 and T3.is_del = '0'
and T2.flag = #{flag}
and T1.user_id = #{userId}
and T3.village_id = #{villageId} and T3.town_id = #{townId} and T3.district_id = #{districtId}
and T1.user_id IN ( SELECT uid FROM trade_company_tbl WHERE tid = #{tradeId} )
and T3.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{companyName},'%')
and T2.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title},'%')
having c = 0
having c > 0
order by T1.id desc
mapper.update:
update t_rectification_tbl
item1 = #{item1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item2 = #{item2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
plan_time = #{planTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where check_id = #{checkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
